description: This file provides a mock implementation of the FlutterSecureStoragePlatform for unit testing purposes. It includes methods to simulate secure storage operations such as write, read, delete, and read all, using an in-memory map. It also provides utility functions to set up and access the mock storage instance for testing workflows.

classes.name: MockSecureStoragePlatform
classes.description: A mock class inheriting from FlutterSecureStoragePlatform, simulating secure storage behavior with an in-memory map.

methods.name: write
methods.description: Simulates writing a key-value pair to secure storage.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Retrieves the value associated with a key from the mock storage.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a key and its value from the mock storage.

methods.name: deleteAll
methods.description: clears all stored key-value pairs in the mock storage.

methods.name: readAll
methods.description: Returns all key-value pairs currently stored.

methods.name: containsKey
methods.description: Checks if a key exists in the storage.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Utility method to clear the mock storage, useful for test cleanup.

methods.name: setupMockSecureStorage
methods.description: Sets up the mock storage instance as the platform's singleton for testing.

methods.name: getMockSecureStoragePlatform
methods.description: Provides access to the mock platform instance for direct manipulation in tests.
